headline: Greta: Holocaust Remembrance Day and its meaning today

utterances.speaker: Greta's 'Off the Record' comment to 'On the Record' viewers
utterances.utterance: We would love to think anti-Semitism behind us, but it isn't By Greta Van Susteren Let's all go "Off the Record." Today's International Holocaust Remembrance Day and also the 71st anniversary of the Liberation of Auschwitz - the extermination in Poland for more than 1.1 million Jews were murdered.

utterances.speaker: Now I'd like to think anti-Semitism is behind us, but it isn't. Christian pastor Saeed Abedini, just out of an Iranian prison, told me this about the Iranian government
SAEED ABEDINI, CHRISTIAN PASTOR RELEASED FROM IRAN

And today, though, as we remember the millions of victims of the Holocaust, we should also thank your father, your grandfather, your mother, your grandmother, that entire generation that fought so notably in World War II.
